title: Our references
subtitle: What do our clients say about us?

testimonials.author: Ing. Jan Dvořák
testimonials.text: EX Pohledávky provides us with complete services reliably, and we can happily state that we have only experienced a very accommodating approach and willingness. We are happy to turn to the company with any problem and we know that we will always receive a quality result.

testimonials.author: Jan Decker
testimonials.text: EX Pohledávky is always a guarantee of professional services in the field of debt collection. Thanks to the excellent work of Mr. Chromy, our cash flow is very good and we don't have to waste time begging for invoice payments.

testimonials.author: Petra Novotná
testimonials.text: I am extremely satisfied with EX Pohledávky, which handles the complete agenda of debt collection for our company. The flexibility, speed, and reliability of the company are valuable assets.
